allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix auth and static pages - restore layouts with theme toggle

CRITICAL FIX:
- Restored original layouts for 9 pages that were broken
- Login, signup, password reset pages now styled correctly
- Account, admin, pricing, privacy, terms pages fixed
- Added theme toggle to all restored pages

Pages fixed:
- login.html, signup.html
- forgot_password.html, reset_password.html
- account.html, admin_dashboard.html
- pricing.html, privacy.html, terms.html

Issue: Previous CSS "unification" removed essential
page-specific styles. Each page needs its own inline
styles for proper layout while using basic.css for
theme variables.

Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(for file in web/templates/screener.html web/templates/watchlist.html web/templates/calendar.html web/templates/news.html web/templates/about.html)
Bash(for file in screener.html watchlist.html calendar.html news.html about.html)

Bash(powershell -Command "(Get-Content ''''$file'''' -Raw -Encoding UTF8) -replace [regex]::Escape(""url_for(\''''static\'''', filename=\''''basic.css\'''')""), ""url_for(''''static'''', filename=''''basic.css'''')"" | Set-Content ''''$file'''' -Encoding UTF8 -NoNewline")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python | Where-Object {$_Path -like ''*python*''} | Format-Table Id, ProcessName, Path -AutoSize")
